query:
ALTER TABLE notyetFollowup 
ADD COLUMN followupType varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '30d' AFTER fitGateResponseId,
ADD COLUMN status ENUM('pending', 'sending', 'sent', 'failed') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending' AFTER followupType,
ADD COLUMN lastError TEXT AFTER sentAt,
ADD COLUMN providerMessageId varchar(255) AFTER lastError,
ADD COLUMN createdAt timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AFTER providerMessageId;
